translation.about_subtitle: A computer engineer who loves to code
translation.about_me: Graduated in Computer Engineering, working in the area of ​​software engineering with emphasis on systems development. We have skills and experience in Java, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Adonis Js, Vue.js, Oracle SQL and SQL Server. I am a Front-End lover, where I always seek to learn and enhance my skills in this development modality, also proficient on projects that requires skills on Back-End development modalities.
translation.contact_subtitle: Do you want to know more about me or talk about a potential project? Send me an email, even if it's just to say hi!
